name: techcube-fullstack
description: TechCube Website with Frontend and Backend Services

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: cd frontend && npm install vite @vitejs/plugin-react && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
